original_text:
You have said, “I have made a covenant with my chosen one;
    I have sworn to David my servant:
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 나는 내가 택한 자와 언약을 맺으며 내 종 다윗에게 맹세하기를

sentences.original_text: I have made a covenant with my chosen one;
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나의 택한 자와 언약을 맺었고,

sentences.original_text: I have sworn to David my servant:
